name: Mass Extinction
description: My First Game EVER - created in one month for GameOff Jam. It's not finished unfortunately - But I still managed to cover most of the plans I had. It did not turn out exactly the way I wanted, but I am happy with it anyway.  There are some small bugs that I didn't have time to correct before the deadline, and I also miss "Game Over" screen, so please accept my apologies for that. It will be better next time, I promise!
